p: The root bark was washed with water to remove earthy materials, after air dried at room temperature under shade it was powdered using a mechanical grinder. The powdered material (1.46 kg) was then extracted by 70% ethanol using soxhlet apparatus by continuous hot extraction. Next, the extract was dried in an oven at 40 °C. The crude extract was packed in airtight amber colored glass and kept in a refrigerator at 4 °C for further experiments.
